mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT SHOP_ID) FROM SHOPPING_CART s WHERE s.USER_ID = #{userId} AND s.STATUS = 'ok'

SELECT g.ID AS ID, g.`NAME` AS NAME, g.SHOP_Id AS SHOP_ID, g.DESCRIPTION AS DESCRIPTION, g.DETAILS AS DETAILS, g.IMG_URL AS IMG_URL, g.PRICE AS PRICE, s.NUMBER AS NUMBER, g.CREATED_AT AS CREATED_AT, g.UPDATED_AT AS UPDATED_AT FROM GOODS g INNER JOIN SHOPPING_CART s ON s.GOODS_ID = g.ID WHERE s.SHOP_ID = #{shopId} AND s.`STATUS` = "ok" AND s.USER_ID = #{userId}
